About

Hi all, my name is Pramod DM, and I’m from Bangalore. I have over 5+ years of experience in the Data Engineering, Data Science and SDE field. Currently, I work as a Consultant Data Scientist 5 at Deloitte. Till now I have worked in various Domains like Telecommunication, Banking, HealthCare-Insurance and ERI domains.I’m passionate about empowering businesses to seamlessly enhance their existing applications with advanced Data Science and AI capabilities—without the need for costly cloud subscriptions. I believe that, instead of defaulting to proprietary cloud solutions, organizations can leverage powerful, open-source ML, DL, and Quantum frameworks to meet their needs. My goal is to make it easy for any business to integrate cutting-edge AI features directly into their code repositories, using free and accessible technologies. I see this as the future of scalable, democratized innovation in the tech industry.
